SSMInstallScriptGenerator Documentation

Main module

Code

This section defines the code that is used.

 1"""
 2This function is used to generate the SSM install script for the customer
 3"""
 4
 5from jinja2 import Environment, FileSystemLoader
 6import boto3
 7import os
 8from aws_xray_sdk.core import xray_recorder
 9from aws_xray_sdk.core import patch_all
10patch_all()
11
12
13@xray_recorder.capture('lambda_handler')
14def lambda_handler(event, context):
15    """
16    This function is used to generate the SSM install script for the customer
17    """
18    # get the template file
19    env = Environment(loader=FileSystemLoader('.'))
20    template = env.get_template('sample.py')
21    bucket = os.environ.get('BUCKET')
22    # Render the template with the environment variable
23    OT_URL = os.environ.get('ONBOARD_TENANT_URL')
24    SA_URL = os.environ.get('SAVE_ACTIVATION_URL')
25    rendered_template = template.render(
26        ONBOARD_TENANT_URL=OT_URL, SAVE_ACTIVATION_URL=SA_URL)
27
28    # send response to api for file download
29    with open("/tmp/install_ssmAgent.py", "w") as f:
30        f.write(rendered_template)
31
32    with open("/tmp/install_ssmAgent.py", "rb") as f:
33        file_data = f.read()
34    response = {
35        "statusCode": 200,
36        "headers": {
37            "Content-Type": "application/octet-stream",
38            "Content-Disposition": "attachment; filename=install_ssmAgent.py"
39        },
40        "body": file_data
41    }
42
43    os.remove("/tmp/install_ssmAgent.py")
44    return response
